name: sbcgfi
params: setvar s0, class c0, wff w0

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0))
-| wnf(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wnf(s0, w0)

comment: Substitution for a variable not free in a wff does not affect it, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 1-Jun-2019.)
